《天外世界》获得美国星云奖Best Game Writing https://i.loli.net/2020/05/31/6HKoNbU8MesBFpD.png
星云奖（Nebula Award）是美国科幻及奇幻作家协会（Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers of America Inc.）颁发的科幻及奇幻艺术年度大奖，因奖品为嵌在荧光树脂中的螺旋状星云而得名。与雨果奖（Hugo Award）同为科幻、奇幻界最受瞩目的年度奖项。
提名名单：
Outer Wilds by Kelsey Beachum, published by Mobius Digital. Nominated for Best Game Writing in 2019
The Outer Worlds by Leonard Boyarsky, Kate Dollarhyde, Paul Kirsch, Chris L’Etoile, Daniel McPhee, Carrie Patel, Nitai Poddar, Marc Soskin, and Megan Starks, published by Obsidian Entertainment. Winner, Best Game Writing in 2019
The Magician’s Workshop by Kate Heartfield, published by Choice of Games. Nominated for Best Game Writing in 2019
Disco Elysium by Robert Kurvitz, published by ZA/UM. Nominated for Best Game Writing in 2019
Fate Accessibility Toolkit by Elsa Sjunneson-Henry, published by Evil Hat Productions. Nominated for Best Game Writing in 2019

发光的球:
《天外世界》获得美国星云奖Best Game Writing

星云奖（Nebula Award）是美国科幻及奇幻作家协会（Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers of America Inc.）颁发的科幻及奇幻艺术年度大奖，因奖品为嵌在荧光树脂中的螺旋状星云而得名。与雨果奖（Hugo Award）同为科幻、奇幻界最受瞩目的年度奖项。
提名名单：
Outer Wilds by Kelsey Beachum, published by Mobius Digital. Nominated for Best Game Writing in 2019
The Outer Worlds by Leonard Boyarsky, Kate Dollarhyde, Paul Kirsch, Chris L’Etoile, Daniel McPhee, Carrie Patel, Nitai Poddar, Marc Soskin, and Megan Starks, published by Obsidian Entertainment. Winner, Best Game Writing in 2019
The Magician’s Workshop by Kate Heartfield, published by Choice of Games. Nominated for Best Game Writing in 2019
Disco Elysium by Robert Kurvitz, published by ZA/UM. Nominated for Best Game Writing in 2019
Fate Accessibility Toolkit by Elsa Sjunneson-Henry, published by Evil Hat Productions. Nominated for Best Game Writing in 2019

那个算不上主要部分吧
比方不能说嗑药文学就一定是幻想文学
以下剧透：
你想想主线剧情都关联了什么，首先大前提一“主角失忆”很有可能是因为喝了被灰域侵染的酒；然后大前提二“枪击案”的一大助燃剂是因为竹节虫的分泌物影响了老兵；直面Ruby时被以灰域效益发生器对付。
商业区破产诅咒总体上是由大环境导致，但教堂那个初生的灰域点也有所贡献。
竹节虫（和神秘生物）还牵连到两个长支线，教堂牵连了2.5个。
推动大环境发展的无罪者在设定上也带超自然要素（有点天启者的意思）。
所以尽管占比相比其它作品不算高，它还真就算SF。

也秉承了威尔斯和凡尔纳，敢揭资本主义老底，虽然不是鼓励工人斗争，但至少能帮助十来岁的年轻人尽早看清社会现实。我觉得这作剧本选材的立意已经很高了。
